amendment.description: To strike the reduction in the funding cap for the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection.

action.text: Amendment SA 2414 ruled out of order by the chair.

Motion to waive section 302(f) of the Congressional Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2414, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 341.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 302(f) of the Congressional Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2414.
Amendment SA 2414 proposed by Senator Warren to Amendment SA 2360.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2414 proposed by Senator Warren to Amendment SA 2360.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive section 302(f) of the Congressional Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2414, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 341.
